Over the years that followed, Donald Rumsfeld observes drily: That particular remark came to my mind on more than one occasion and I never had cause to doubt it. The biggest regret Donald Rumsfeld has is that he failed to resign after the photographs of American soldiers abusing prisoners at Abu Ghraib came to light in 2004. Fiat, whose brands include Ferrari, Maserati and Alfa Romeo. Volkswagen AG Chairman Ferdinand Piech expressed an interest in buying Alfa Romeo. But Friday, Sergio Marchionne flatly rejected any sale of Alfa Romeo to VW. As long as I'm the CEO of both Fiat and Chrysler, Mr. Ferdinand Piech will never get an offer, Sergio Marchionne said during the J.D. Power event. Sergio Marchionne also said Fiat is looking to "redimension" its joint venture with n automaker Tata Motors to sell Fiat-branded cars in India.

The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's historic two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him. "You know, I love Eminem but... Hill from the spring of 2009 until March 2010 when Mr. Barack Obama signed the health care law. The debate was passionate- and in one instance... at variance... with all the talk about new civility: On Jan. 19, the Republican-controlled House voted 245 to 189 to repeal health care reform. The party line vote capped a vigorous debate in which Republicans vilified the health care law and Democrats exalted it, reports CBS News Congressional correspondent Nancy Cordes . "When you order every American to buy health insurance whether they want it, need it or not, that's a government takeover of healthcare," said Nancy Pelosi Mike Pence , R-Indiana, on the floor.
